document.full_text: if the canucks were to lift hockey's ultimate prize, it would be the first time a canada-based team did so since 1993. but many canadians are not as excited as one might think.
document.title: some fans in canada see vancouver as foreign
lines_and_colors: if the canucks were to lift hockey's ultimate prize, it would be the first time a canada-based team did so since 1993. but many canadians are not as excited as one might think.
